A social board game with unpredictable events, You will face 4 modes each one has its own challenge for a specific period of time.
The Easy mode in which the Green shape gives you score, Red shape takes from your life and grey shape takes from your score.
The Sudden Death mode in which the Green will take from you life, Red will give you score and the grey will take from your score.
The DoubleTab mode in which the green gives you double the score and Red is the same also, except the grey it will reduce double the score.
The No Score mode in which all shapes do nothing.
And then comes the Utilities which will help you to achieve your highest score:
The Gifts which gives you score or life.
The Bombs which it will increase or decrease the game speed or it will be a bomb of the 3 colours (Red, Green, Gray) for a specific period of time.
The Dice represents your lucky shot which may give you score or life or takes from your score or life.
The Stopwatch will increase the game countdown timer so you can play more.
You need to keep up with the game or you may lose your life or the time ends up quickly.
